alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 27 at 2:03PM MST until March 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 12 inches possible, with higher amounts over the highest mountains. The heaviest snow is expected Wednesday evening through the overnight hours. Winds could gust as high as 40 to 55 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Alpine, Eagar-Springerville, Pinetop- Lakeside, Saint Johns, Show Low and Whiteriver. * WHEN...From late Wednesday morning through early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. Snow forecast from 11 AM Wednesday to 5 AM Thursday: Alpine 5 to 9 inches Eagar-Sprgrvlle 2 to 4 inches Pinetop-Lkside 9 to 13 inches Saint Johns 2 to 4 inches Show Low 8 to 12 inches Whiteriver 4 to 8 inches .
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
